tool.name: RefSeq assembly to Fasta
tool.description: Generation of a Fasta file based on RefSeq assemblies

param.name: exclude
param.label: Exclude duplicate proteins based on...
param.help: Proteins with the same identifiers will always be removed
param.option: Sequence contained in another protein (Warning, this option is extremely slow: more than 30 minutes for 40 000 proteins, about 2 hours for 80 000 proteins)

tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates a fasta file based on RefSeq assembly data.
You select a taxonomy in the list, and we download the corresponding fasta file from the NCBI FTP server. Given the nature to the data, it is suggested that you remove the duplicate sequences from the fasta file.
Once you have the fasta file generated, you can use it in the Fasta Toolbox to add contaminant proteins, generate decoy entries, etc.
